thread.title: Red Zone Player of the Week: TJ Hammonds of Robinson

title: Red Zone Player of the Week: TJ Hammonds of Robinson
text:
Red Zone Player of the Week: TJ Hammonds of Robinson This week's Red Zone Player is Robinson's running back, TJ Hammonds. Post to Facebook Red Zone Player of the Week: TJ Hammonds of Robinson This week's Red Zone Player is Robinson's running back, TJ Hammonds.  //on.kthv.com/1LNdQhZ   Join the Conversation To   Red Zone Player of the Week: TJ Hammonds of Robinson THV11's Mary Dunleavy introduces this week's Red Zone Player THV11 Digital Team, news source 9:56 p.m. CDT October 21, 2015 TJ Hammonds CONNECT TWEET LINKEDIN COMMENT EMAIL MORE 
LITTLE ROCK, Ark. (KTHV) -- Each week, THV11 showcases one football player who is going above and beyond on the field. This week's Red Zone Player is Robinson's running back, TJ Hammonds. 
In Robinson's game against Clinton last week, Hammonds ran four times for 65 yards and four touchdowns in the Senators' 30 point win making him our Red Zone Player of the Week. 
Watch the video for more! Read or Share this story: http://on.kthv.com/1LNdQhZ TOP VIDEOS
